title: Honoring in Aram or TT Ai Games
body:
I was just wondering if honoring in Aram and TT Ai gives as much honor points as in Summoners Rift (Normals and Ranked).

And also, do we get honor points in games without getting honored by someone?

replies.body: Honouring in ARAM and Twisted Treeline AI, at least in my own personal experience, provides similar, if not the same, honour progress. However, without discrete metrics as to how much honour progress is given in each queue, all we are able to provide is our speculation. Hopefully that helps!
